name: Fuji Shibazakura (Unedited Original)
description:
This unedited photo serves as the basis for my "Fuji Shibazakura" piece, originally minted on Foundation. Taken at an annual flower festival hosted nearby Mount Fuji and Lake Motosu. The feeling I remember most from this day is a sharp, idillic dissonance between the crisp air, bright phlox, and my own internal strife.

Link to full piece: https://foundation.app/@grxnda/~/79911
Link to full story: https://uuyuc.art/kintsugi2016/
